artist: Artist: Lucien Coutaud; Author: Gilbert Lely; Publisher: Maeght Éditeur, Paris
catalogue_raissonne: Pierre Cailler, "Catalogue Raisonné de l'Oeuvre Gravé et Lithographié de Lucien Coutaud," Geneva, 1960.
description: brown slipcase with intricate black line drawing; hardbound book inside with similar line drawing on cover; inside opens up with twenty loose folded prints enclosed by one folded cover; lender's archive #064

provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
title: Ma Civilisation (My Civilization)
